result.eng: Copyright is usually held by whoever created the work.
result.ga: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chum
result.orig: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chum
result.html: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chumCopyright is usually held by whoever created the work.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an cóipċeart leis an té a ċumCopyright is usually held by whoever created the work.

result.eng: He created a modern image for the company.
result.ga: Chruthaigh sé íomhá nua-aimseartha don chomhlacht
result.orig: Chruthaigh sé íomhá nua-aimseartha don chomhlacht
result.html: Chruthaigh sé íomhá nua-aimseartha don chomhlachtHe created a modern image for the company.
result.ponchtml: Ċruṫaiġ sé íoṁá nua-aimsearṫa don ċoṁlaċtHe created a modern image for the company.

result.eng: He created us in his own image.
result.ga: Ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinn
result.orig: Ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinn
result.html: Ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinnHe created us in his own image.
result.ponchtml: Ina ċosúlaċt féin a ċruṫaiġ sé sinnHe created us in his own image.

result.eng: Technological progress had created new opportunities.
result.ga: Bhí deiseanna úra cruthaithe ag dul chun cinn teicneolaíoch
result.orig: Bhí deiseanna úra cruthaithe ag dul chun cinn teicneolaíoch

result.ponchtml: Ḃí deiseanna úra cruṫaiṫe ag dul ċun cinn teicneolaíoċTechnological progress had created new opportunities.
